entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 99
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos from the special event 1984-0215 Marriages, Bordi, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 27 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1984.
The marriages' events have as well 31 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Moments of Joy 1984.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, September 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, September 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month new Photos were uploaded to 12 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1981-0126 Śhrī Lakṣhmī-Viṣhṇu: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1981.
(ii) 1982-0201 Śhrī Durgā Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1982.
(iii) 1982-0926 Śhrī Durgā Pūjā: 1 high resolutions uploaded, link Austria 1982.
(iv) 1983-0121 Śhrī Devī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1983.
(v) 1984-0902 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1984.
(vi) 1984-0916 Śhrī Ekādaśha Rudra Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Italy 1984.
(vii) 1992-0419 Easter Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1992.
(viii) 1993-0704 Guru Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1993.
(ix) 1993-0815 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1993.
(x) 1993-1010 Śhrī Virāṭa Virāṭaṅganā Pūjā,: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 1993.
(xi) 1998-0906 Śhrī Gaurī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1998.
(xii) 2000-0702 Śhrī Ādi Śhakti Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 2000.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
